item.title: Hong Kong Foodie Tour introduces a new tour to Tai Po Market
item.description: Source: Hong Kong Foodie. Hong Kong Foodie has created a food tour in Tai Po Market. This is their third food tour, and it will take people to six family-owned restaurants in Tai Po Market that serve authentic Hong Kong cuisine. Cecilia Leung, the Founder and Director of Hong Kong Foodie, believes that Tai Po Market is the perfect location for their newest tour because it has many beloved local restaurants.
